DOC.brief_title: Acetaminophen Fetal Tachycardia : Randomized Pilot Trial
DOC.detailed_description: This trial randomize , non-placebo control , assessment whether acetaminophen lower maternal temperature baseline fetal heart rate labor patient fetal tachycardia . Term singleton cephalic pregnancy active phase labor ( spontaneous induce ) fetal tachycardia recruit . Patient exclude : - Exclusion criterion ( prior randomization ) : - Acetaminophen allergy - Clinical chorioamnionitis - Maternal fever - Non-reassuring fetal status ( NRFS ) , designation fetal heart rate abnormality require cesarean delivery - Previous cesarean delivery - Multifetal gestation - Breech presentation - Known fetal anomaly - Known contraindication vaginal delivery Primary outcome measure : 1 . Maternal body temperature ( oral ) 90 minute treatment 2 . Baseline FHR Secondary outcome measure : 1 . Temperature difference treatment 2 . Rate cesarean delivery 3 . Rate determination NRFS 4 . Rate subsequent development maternal fever 5 . Rate diagnosis clinical chorioamnionitis 6 . Rate neonatal sepsis Power calculation Internal data collection institution 53 patient show mean decrease temperature patient labor fever receive acetaminophen 0.3 degree C measure average ( mean ) 90 minute administration acetaminophen . Mean oral temperature acetaminophen 38.32 , SD 0.33 . Mean oral temperature acetaminophen 38.03 , SD 0.85 . Sample size calculation show 27 patient need group show significant difference use alpha 5 % beta 50 % .
